octavia_load_balancer_pools_create_algor: The Load Balancer algorithm that distributes traffic between pool members.
Rotates queries evenly across several instances.
Allocates requests to the instance with the lowest number of active connections.
Requests from a single source IP address are consistently directed to the same instance.
Requests from a single source port source IP address are consistently directed to the same instance.
octavia_load_balancer_pools_create_proto: The protocol on which this pool and its members are listening.
octavia_load_balancer_pools_create_sessi: Persistent session type for distributing traffic to pool members.
octavia_load_balancer_pools_create_persi: Session persistence based on source IP address.
Session persistence based on http cookies.
Session persistence based on the application cookies.
